mapper.select: SELECT * FROM fan_meetings WHERE status = 'PLANNED' ORDER BY meeting_date ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fan_meetings ( title, description, venue_name, venue_address, meeting_date, vip_open_time, gold_open_time, silver_open_time, white_open_time, general_open_time, status, poster_image_url ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{description}, #{venueName}, #{venueAddress}, #{meetingDate}, #{vipOpenTime}, #{goldOpenTime}, #{silverOpenTime}, #{whiteOpenTime}, #{generalOpenTime}, #{status}, #{posterImageUrl} )
mapper.select: SELECT meeting_id AS meetingId, title, description, venue_name AS venueName, venue_address AS venueAddress, meeting_date AS meetingDate, total_seats AS totalSeats, available_seats AS availableSeats, status, vip_open_time AS vipOpenTime, gold_open_time AS goldOpenTime, silver_open_time AS silverOpenTime, white_open_time AS whiteOpenTime, general_open_time AS generalOpenTime, poster_image_url AS posterImageUrl FROM fan_meetings WHERE meeting_id = #{meetingId}
